alert.note: Alert for Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 7:10PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade County through 745 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or near Kendall, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... The Crossings, Tamiami, Kendale Lakes, West Kendall, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, The Hammocks, Miccosukee Resort, Country Walk, Kendall West and Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
